ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Level 20 research pages .. and evil eye .. questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Mez the pet first.  If you then pop the eye before the mez wears off the pet should pop. I have done this in east karana with the Evil Eye that wanders there.
ygData.messageBody:
Mez the pet first.  If you then pop the eye before the mez wears off the pet should pop.
I have done this in east karana with the Evil Eye that wanders there.
We had a party and killed the eye fast.
I am 16 and on fenin.  Love to buy those pages your throwing away by the way ;)
Stonedreamer of Fenin Ro and EQPortal.com


"Deryn Morin" <deryn@...>

03/02/00 07:29 PM
Please respond to eqenchanters

       
        To:        <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
        cc:        
        Subject:        [eqenchanters] Level 20 research pages .. and evil eye .. questions

From: "Deryn Morin" <deryn@...>

Does anyone know the best mobs to look for to get Tasarin's pages 30 and 312 for beserker strength and color shift spells.  Since I fail repeatedly at making them, and I see no one auctioning these pages, at this rate I will be level 30 before I have them.  
 
And looking ahead a bit as well, where should I go for the level 24 research pages as well.  
 
I was level 18 when I found out that Jonah and other Lake Rathe mobs give level 16 ones out like candy.  Now those pages (for 16) are all I ever see anywhere (I practically throw them away I have so many), but there must be other treasure troves like Jonah for level 20 and 24 spells too (I hope).
 
My poor (and I mean 'broke') level 21 enchantress has CHA and INT both just over 130.  I am working hard on jewelcraft to try to fill in my (bare) ear slots, and wrist slots in particular, but she currently sports damask or leather or cloth underwear. A second question I have is .. at what level can I successfully do Evil Eyes in the gorge (given the above stats, and with a magic resist of 57).  
 
My druid, with a partner druid, has a lot of trouble with them at level 25/26 (magic resist at base 25) but since evil eyes are enchanters, I hoped we might be more successful at earlier levels?
 
 I (my enchanter) often group with a level 21 cleric but I think we might need another tank type to help out (unless my pet can take on that role?)  Evil eyes often seem to have both an animation and a mino pet, and they throw blindness, fear, debuffs and charm on us. Can be wild there. Fun but I am going steadily backwards with my druid so far.
 
Thanks for any help you can give me. I enjoy this list very much.
 
Chiasma
21st season, Fennin Ro
